price: Siku itapo geuzwa ardhi iwe ardhi nyengine, na mbingu pia. Nao watahudhuria mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu Mmoja, Mwenye nguvu.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُۖ وَبَرَزُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ
footnotes: Basi Mwenyezi Mungu atalipizia Siku ya Kiyama itapo geuzwa ardhi iwe ardhi nyengine sio hii ya sasa, na mbingu hali kadhaalika zigeuzwe ziwe nyengine, na viumbe watolewe makaburini mwao kwa hukumu ya Mwenyezi Mungu asiye na mshirika, wala wa kumshinda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma tubaddalu al-arḍu ghayra al-arḍi wal-samāwātu wabarazū lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
